price: Ese (yewe Muhamadi) inkuru y’abari bashyamiranye yaba yarakugezeho, ubwo buriraga bagasanga (Dawudi) aho yasengeraga (Mih’rab).
arabic: ۞ وَهَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ نَبَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَصۡمِ إِذۡ تَسَوَّرُواْ ٱلۡمِحۡرَابَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wahal atāka naba-u al-khaṣmi idh tasawwarū al-miḥ'rāba
